mapper.select: SELECT TAIRI.REFID, TAIRI.AUTHREFTYPE, TAIRI.AUTHID AS authItem_id, TAIRI.ISVALIDDEPENDENDDATE, TAIRI.CREATEOPERID, TAIRI.ENDDATE, TAIRI.CREATEDATE FROM T_AUTH_AUTHREF TAIRI WHERE TAIRI.REFID = #{refId} AND TAIRI.AUTHREFTYPE = #{authRefType} AND TAIRI.AUTHID = #{authItem.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_AUTH_AUTHREF ( REFID, AUTHREFTYPE, AUTHID, ISVALIDDEPENDENDDATE, CREATEOPERID, ENDDATE, CREATEDATE ) VALUES ( #{refId}, #{authRefType}, #{authItem.id}, #{isValidDependEndDate}, #{createOperId}, #{endDate}, #{createDate} )
